description.message: Track and rate your favourite TV-shows

externalSearchAdd.description: Open settings to add a new search

unwatchedNumber_title.description: Attribute title of an element with number of unwatched episodes

backButton_title.message: Back to the list of the shows
backButton_title.description: Back to main page button title attribute

showLink_title.description: Attribute title of a show's link

season.description: Word season in header of season block

commentsNumber_title.description: Attribute title of episode's comments number

calendar_today.description: Calendar: name of the group of episodes that air today

postponedListTitle.description: Title of the list with postponed shows

postponedShowCount_title.description: Attribute title of postponed show's episodes number

settingFontSize_title.message: Scale extension's window and font sizes by chosen basic font size

settingDateFormat.description: Setting: set format of the dates

settingSortOrder.message: Sort order of episodes and seasons:

settingSortOldToNew.description: Setting: sort order option from old to new

settingSortNewToOld.description: Setting: sort order option from new to old

settingTitleRuAndOrig.description: Setting: display Russian and original show's titles option

settingTitleRu.description: Setting: display only Russian show's titles option

settingLocaleGroup_label.description: Attribute label for display show's titles option optgroup

settingSortShows.message: Place shows with new episodes at the top
settingSortShows.description: Setting: sort shows by latest episodes or not

settingShowNextEpisode.message: Always show the next episode on the "Shows" tab
settingShowNextEpisode.description: Setting: always show the next episode

settingShowNextEpisode_title.message: Always show the next episode or only by hover
settingShowNextEpisode_title.description: Attribute title for show next episode option

settingExternalLinksLegend.message: Search a show on external websites:
settingExternalLinksLegend.description: Setting: search a show on external websites:
